review: I found the Hach 2745250 Total Hardness Test Strips to be a reliable and easy-to-use tool for testing water hardness. The strips provide quick results and are very handy for checking the effectiveness of my water softener. However, I did find it a bit challenging to read the color changes when the results fall between two colors. Despite this minor issue, the product is a good value for the price and does the job well.
